Sodashi Balancing Face and Neck Moisturiser

Brand: Sodashi

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: aqua (purified water), , rosa damascena (damask rose floral water), corylus avellana (hazelnut oil), cetearyl alcohol (plant derived), simmondsia chinensis (jojoba oil), macadamia integrifolia (macadamia oil), prunus armeniaca (apricot kernel oil), prunus dulcis (almond oil), butyrospermum parkii (shea nut butter*), rosa rubiginosa

simmondsia chinensis (jojoba oil), macadamia integrifolia (macadamia oil), prunus armeniaca (apricot kernel oil), prunus dulcis (almond oil), butyrospermum parkii (shea nut butter*), rosa rubiginosa (rosehip oil*), tocopherol (vitamin E), citrus grandis (grapefruit seed extract), citrus aurantifolia (lime*), cymbopogon martinii (palmarosa*),

parkii (shea nut butter*), rosa rubiginosa (rosehip oil*), tocopherol (vitamin E), citrus grandis (grapefruit seed extract), citrus aurantifolia (lime*), cymbopogon martinii (palmarosa*), lavandula latifolia (lavender spike*), cedrus atlantica (cedarwood*), rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary*).
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
